title: 求救qwq 关于ncp
author: Tommer
txt_content:
survivalfly:
      active: true
      extended:
        vertical-accounting: true
      stepheight: default
      hbufmax: 1.0
      setbackpolicy:
        falldamage: true
        voidtovoid: true
      actions: log:flyfile:3:10:f cancel vl>100 log:flyshort:0:10:i log:flyfile:0:10:f cancel vl>400 log:flylong:0:5:i log:flyfile:0:5:cf cancel vl>1500 log:flylong:0:5:i log:flyfile:0:5:cf cancel cmd:kickfly
      hover:
        active: true
        step: 5
        ticks: 85
        loginticks: 60
        falldamage: true
        sfviolation: 500


不知道哪个是调阈值的
老是误报飞行

replies.author: fyxrim
replies.txt_content:
233昨天我装了这个很无效  可以xary无视这个飞行 还有作弊端无视这个

我给你推荐反作弊插件

[安全|管理]AnticheatReloaded —— 一款多功能反作弊系统丨更新V1.6.1 [1.7-1.11]
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-660005-1-1.html
(出处: Minecraft(我的世界)中文论坛)

replies.author: Tommer
replies.txt_content:
